pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: National Lutheran Council, Division of Public Relations, Department of Radio and Television: Correspondence Files
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains correspondence, reports, articles, program scripts, contracts, copyright certificates, program listings, publicity materials and form letters relating to the Department's involvement in administering its radio programs, including Children's Chapel and Invitation for Tomorrow, its television program light Time and its participation in the CBS radio program Church of the Air. See related file with Department minutes and agendas, 1941-1964.
